root.description: OverviewHacker Evolution: Untold is a simulation game developed and published by exoSyphen Studios for the PC, Mac, and iPhone platforms.In this game you again play Brian Spencer and you have to clear your name in a computer dominated world by hacking into computer systems al over the world. Only that way you can get rid of your crimes you are falsely accused of.The PC version of the game contains a module to create your own scenario's.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP / 2000 / 2003 / Vista / Windows 7Processor: 1 GhzMemory: 512 MbGraphics: DirectX compatible video cardDirectXÂ®: 8.0Hard Drive: 200 MbSound: DirectX compatible sound cardMac System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Mac OS X 10.5.8Processor: 1 GhzMemory: 512 MbHard Drive: 200 MbGraphics:32Mb video card
